name: FULL NAME (e.g., Aidan Gillespie)

education.degree: DEGREE + MAJOR (e.g., B.S. in Computer Science)
education.details: SHORT SUMMARY (e.g., Concentration in data science and machine learning.)

experience.role: JOB TITLE (e.g., Product Engineer – Data Analytics)
bullets: RESULT-FOCUSED BULLET (e.g., Built X that improved Y by Z%).
KEEP BULLETS SHORT, START WITH STRONG VERBS.

projects.name: PROJECT NAME (e.g., Sudoku Sage)
projects.summary: 1–2 SENTENCE DESCRIPTION OF WHAT THIS PROJECT DOES.

skills: KEEP THIS AS A FLAT LIST OF STRINGS.
